projects.name: Portfolio Website
projects.desc: This website! It was an opportunity for me to learn React (as well as React Router) and create a single page application (SPA) based on the knowledge I gained. There are no CSS frameworks being used, and all of the assets are created by me. The particle animation background was implemented using a library called Pt.js. Currently, I'm working on making the whole site more responsive and mobile-friendly.

projects.name: Plan Me
projects.desc: Created at MHacks 8. This web application is an intelligent calendar that schedules events for you based on a personal profile created based on pseudo-machine learning.

projects.name: Bepple
projects.desc: Built for the final project of the SE101 course. This is a suite of "applications" that run on the Tiva C Launchpad platform (equipped with the Digilent Orbit Boosterpack), to use the full suite of IO available on both boards.

projects.name: Inverzion
projects.desc: Built as a personal project. This is a fast-paced platformer game in which you have to flip your color to match the platforms and survive for as long as you can. Features original assets and music created on Adobe Illustrator and FL Studio. Currently refactoring on Unity due to code loss :(
